summary: Fontayne is enlisted by Bernice - her estranged old friend and current parole officer - along with a disgraced cop to search for Bernice's son, who went missing on the Mexican border.
cast: LisaGay Hamilton|Edward James Olmos|Yolonda Ross|Hilary Barraford|Mahershala Ali|Harold Perrineau|Michael Piznarski|Mary Portser|Don Harvey|Brent Jennings|Isaiah Washington|Michael Laskin|Rita Taggart|Jonathan Castellanos|Thai Fong|Vanessa Martinez|Tessa Ferrer|Evelina Fernández|Sal Lopez|Manny Montana|Jesse Borrego|Andrés Zuno|Hector Elizondo|Elizabeth Sung|Martha Higareda|Alejandro Cardenas|Richard Coca|Omar Leyva|Dominic Colón|Jacob Vargas|Javier Calderon|Jessica Pimentel|César Alejandro|McKinley Belcher III|Yasushi Takada|Glenn Fontane|Rosalio Garcia|Jaton Justice|Jose Lizarde Jr.|Galicia Vaca Lopez|Brian Metran|Ivone Reyes|Megan Sousa|Kevin Young|César Zamora
title: Go for Sisters
